cleaned_text: VISIT FREE YOUR MIND BODY AND SOUL WELLNESS IN OWENSBORO, KY At Free Your Mind Body and Soul Wellness LLC we strive to be your go-to destination for all your self-care needs. We are proud to be a local business serving Evansville, IN & Owensboro, KY and surrounding areas. We encourage you to give us a call to talk about how our different services can benefit you in many ways by getting relief from pain, boosting your immune system, improving lymphatic function and much more. We are certified in myofascial release therapy and rely on years of experience to help you feel better than ever.
